text: "Cherish" is a 1985 song by Kool & the Gang and is the third single from their 16th studio album Emergency. It went to number 2 in the United States and Switzerland, number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 6 in Ireland, number 5 in Germany, number 3 in the Netherlands, Belgium and Austria, number 11 in France, number 19 in Sweden and number 8 in Australia. ==Pappa Bear version== Pappa Bear covered Cherish in 1997 and went to number 2 in Austria, Germany and Switzerland, number 1 in New Zealand and number 7 in Norway and Australia. This version remains unknown in the United States and had success in Europe, Australia and New Zealand. ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:R&B; ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Kool & the Gang songs Category:Deniece Williams songs
title: Cherish (Kool & the Gang song)
